meta.job_title: Senior Product Manager - Home Storage (Consumer Goods)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead strategic product planning, development, and management for Home Storage products within the Consumer Goods industry.
Mentor and lead product managers and associates in the development and execution of product strategies.
Contribute to category development strategies to drive growth and profitability of Home Storage product lines.
Ensure the competitiveness and profitability of Home Storage product lines through effective management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field (Master's preferred)
